tasks.label: Build
args: "-X main.gitBranch=`git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD` -X main.gitHash=`git rev-parse --verify HEAD` -X main.gitDirty=`git diff --quiet; [ $? -eq 0 ] && echo false || echo true`"

tasks.label: Dev
tasks.command: rm -rf work/install && mkdir -p work/install && go run main.go build.go --install-dir=work/install --profile-zip=Profile.r2z --work-dir=work/cache
